signup.legal.title: Legal Agreements
signup.legal.description: Before you start using Literary Universe, please review and agree to the following terms.
signup.legal.terms.prefix: I have read and agree to the
signup.legal.terms.suffix: which govern my use of Literary Universe.
signup.legal.privacy.prefix: I have read and understand the
signup.legal.privacy.suffix: and how my personal data will be processed.
signup.legal.cookies.suffix: as described in the Cookie Policy.
signup.legal.marketing: I would like to receive updates, news, and promotional content from Literary Universe.
signup.userType.title: What brings you to Literary Universe?
signup.userType.description: Choose how you'd like to use Literary Universe. You can always change this later in your settings.
signup.userType.reader.title: Reader
signup.userType.reader.description: I want to discover and read great stories
signup.userType.author.title: Writer
signup.userType.author.description: I want to create and publish my own stories
signup.language.title: Language Preferences
signup.language.description: Choose your preferred language settings for the best experience.
signup.requiredSettings.title: Required Settings
signup.requiredSettings.description: Please provide the following required information to complete your profile.
signup.genres.title: Genre Selection
signup.genres.description: Select the genres that interest you.
signup.genres.hint: Select up to 5 genres to get personalized recommendations.
signup.reader.genres.title: What are your favorite genres?
signup.reader.genres.description: Pick the ones that best match your interests.
signup.writer.genres.title: What genres do you write in?
signup.writer.genres.description: Pick the ones that best match your writing style.
signup.mediaType.title: Media Preferences
signup.mediaType.description: Select the types of media you prefer.
signup.reader.mediaType.title: What type of stories do you prefer?
signup.reader.mediaType.description: Pick the ones that best match your interests.
signup.writer.mediaType.title: What type of media do you enjoy the most?
signup.writer.mediaType.description: Pick the ones that best match your interests.
signup.writer.mediaType.fanFiction.title: Fan Fiction
signup.writer.mediaType.audiobook.title: Audiobook
signup.writer.mediaType.webtoons.title: Webtoons
signup.writer.experience.title: What is your writing experience level?
signup.writer.experience.description: This helps us tailor resources and recommendations to your needs.
signup.writer.experience.beginner.title: Beginner
signup.writer.experience.beginner.descri: I'm just starting my writing journey
signup.writer.experience.intermediate.de: I've written before but haven't published much
signup.writer.experience.advanced.title: Advanced
signup.writer.experience.advanced.descri: I've published work and have some experience
signup.writer.experience.professional.de: I'm a professional writer with significant experience
signup.writer.goals.title: What are your goals as a writer?
signup.writer.goals.buildAudience: Build an audience for my work
signup.writer.goals.customPlaceholder: Tell us about your writing goals...
signup.complete.title: You're all set!
signup.complete.description: Thank you for completing your profile. We've customized your experience based on your preferences.
signup.complete.emailVerification.title: Check your email
signup.complete.emailVerification.descri: We've sent a verification email to your address. Please verify your email to unlock all features.
signup.complete.nextSteps.title: What's next?
signup.complete.nextSteps.reader.step1: Explore stories in your favorite genres
signup.complete.nextSteps.reader.step3: Create reading lists to organize stories
signup.complete.nextSteps.reader.step4: Join the community and discuss stories with other readers
signup.complete.nextSteps.writer.step1: Create your first universe or story in the Workshop
signup.complete.nextSteps.writer.step4: Connect with other writers in the community
